Sept. 24, 1949 D Wigton Contest
Wigton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
wigton-contest
None
Pride of the Forest
Wigton, Cumbria, England, UK Test piece - choice of Pride of the Forest, Mountain Chief or Over the Hills, March contest - 1st Craghead Colliery, 2nd Lowca Colliery, 3rd Carlisle St Stephens. Hymn tune contest - 1st Craghead Colliery, 2nd Carlisle St tephens, 3rd Maryport Albion. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £12.10s. and cup, 3rd £7.10s. and cup. 10 bands competed.
Feb. 14, 2014, 9:16 a.m. March 1, 2019, 3:54 p.m.
1 Carlisle City J. J. Ruddick
2 Lowca Colliery Unknown
3 Reg Vardy Band Jack Smith
4 Workington W. Petre
